titles.title: Medicare Organization Report Enhancing (MORE) Summaries Act
Medicare Organization Report Enhancing (MORE) Summaries Act
A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to evaluate how the frequency of summary notices provided to patients can be increased, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Medicare Organization Report Enhancing (MORE) Summaries Act
This bill requires the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation to test a model under which explanations of Medicare benefits are sent more frequently to beneficiaries, either by mail or virtually, and through which the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services annually evaluates how well beneficiaries are able to identify fraud based on explanations of their benefits.
